item.title: Frognal and Netherhall Way, 12th September
item.description:
There is no signage coming down Frognal towards the Finchley Road for drivers to be alerted to cyclists coming up Frognal from Finchley Road and about to turn onto Netherhall Way. On Friday we lead a bike bus of children up this way, and it is currently very dangerous as cars speed down Frognal. Can there be some signage added to alert them that a, the road is not one way, and b, cyclists are coming round the corner trying to enter Netherhall. There are always vehicles parked on the corner and so there is no visibility. It is incredibly dangerous for cycling families.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 26, Frognal, South Hampstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Brand new fancy brickwork of the £169,000 redesigned Chinese Roundabout damaged. About three bricks knocked askew. Jct of Wickham Rd and Stone Park Avenue, Beckenham., 12th September
item.description:
Brand new fancy brickwork of the £169,000 redesigned Chinese Roundabout damaged. About three bricks knocked askew. Jct of Wickham Rd and Stone Park Avenue, Beckenham. Incidentally, what was once an attractive roundabout looks now, with the black and white chevrons all around it, like something from a motor racing circuit.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Chinese Roundabout, Eden Park, London
Report on FixMyStreet
